subtitles.text:
I'm Riko Endo, a sophomore from Saitama
prefecture.
I came to a place to meet a dog today.

This is my first time meeting a dog at a
grocery store.
Daifuku-kun is on his knees.

He was a little greedy and died, but he
was very cute.

Today I came to take a walk in Columbus
Park.
I've loved animals since I was a kid.

I often played with my dog at the house
of a neighbor who had a dog.

I will play the song, Why I didn't fall
in love.

I've been practicing this song for about
a month.

I've been practicing this song for a
month.

I was very anxious at first, and I
wanted to make it a little easier.

I wanted to try it, so I chose this
song.
Today is the first day of practice.

I rented a studio and came to practice
the drums.
I came to the studio to practice today.
Today, I came to shoot the drum video.

This group called Sakura-zaka has a lot
of charm that other groups don't have.

I naturally fell in love with Sakura-
zaka.

I will do my best to show the results of
my practice for about a month while
playing with the feelings of Sakura-
zaka.
Thank you for watching!

When I was a kid, I was a very quiet
kid.

I went to the same elementary school as
my friend, and I had a different friend
in junior high school.

I met that kid for the first time in a
long time, and he said,
You're not a laughing kid, are you?
I was a kid who didn't talk much.

But recently, I've been laughing more
and talking more.

I think I've gotten a little more like
myself than before.

When a kid like me sees myself, I want
to be like that.
I want to be someone who admires me.
Thank you for watching!
